[[inst_hl_shp]]
==== HL.SHP

*Syntax:* hl.shp SrcD, SrcD1, [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<1]

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_shp.svg[HL.SHP encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/PAIR
